```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

### The following will be installed on the server

- vcftools
- plink
- admixture

### You will need to install the following on your computers.

- R
- R studio
- Sublime text
- putty (windows users only)

### In addition you will need to install some R packages. To do so, open R and paste the following code into the console:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("ggplot2")
install.packaged("plyr")
```
